name: tiny_23m_sft_balanced
description: PREMIUM SFT corpus for Tiny 23M model - 3 high-quality datasets (15M tokens): OASST1 + WizardLM + Orca

datasets.name: openassistant_v1
datasets.description: OpenAssistant OASST1 - PREMIUM QUALITY conversational data with human preferences

datasets.name: wizardlm_70k
datasets.description: WizardLM Evol-Instruct 70k - PREMIUM QUALITY complex instructions (ICLR 2024, superior to Alpaca)

datasets.name: open_orca
datasets.description: Open-Orca - HIGH QUALITY GPT-4 augmented dataset (1M samples, diverse reasoning tasks)

processing_metadata.template_rationale: Instruct format chosen for better tokenization efficiency
processing_metadata.sft_rationale: SFT optimal range: 10-15M tokens (0.43-0.65 tokens/param) for quality/diversity balance

dataset_distribution.oasst1: ~33% of tokens (5.0M) - PREMIUM conversational with preferences
dataset_distribution.wizardlm_70k: ~33% of tokens (5.0M) - PREMIUM complex Evol-Instruct, ICLR 2024
dataset_distribution.open_orca: ~33% of tokens (5.0M) - HIGH QUALITY GPT-4 augmented dataset (1M samples)

processing_metadata.training_efficiency: ~5,400 steps for 2 epochs, 4-5 hours on RTX 4090
processing_metadata.research_basis: WizardLM (ICLR 2024) significantly outperforms Alpaca - balanced complexity distribution for better complex task handling
processing_metadata.upgrade_notes: v4.0: Replaced Alpaca with WizardLM (ICLR 2024, superior). v4.1: Removed Dolly (too small, 1.4M tokens) + ShareGPT (unavailable) + Intel Orca DPO (too small). Final 3-dataset mix: OASST1 + WizardLM + Open-Orca (equal weights, 5M tokens each, 1M+ samples total).
